name: Flux Ball
summary: Why stop with pivots and squats?  Flux Ball pressures the player to lie flat and tumble out of sticky situations, constantly moving between standing, crouching and prone positions.  Engage in a close quarters shoot out using your Guard Cage for protection from enemy fire.  When struck, your cage will be lowered into a liquid container, drowning those who fall too far down.  Flux Ball is best played on fitness mats and/or a rug.  Come test your Flux Ball...
